name: John
story: John has spent more time in war than peace. He retired a Brigadier General and thought he would spend his twilight years on his family estate in England. Sadly, he was wrong. A secretive cult set its sights on his familyâ€™s land, owing to the river of dark power flowing beneath it. His entire family, from grandchildren up, were killed in the attack, which was thwarted by a team of investigators and his own skill in battle. John now works with investigators, advising on how best to prosecute their secret war.
